member.name: T:UltimateQuadTree.QuadTree`1
member.summary: Represents a tree data structure in which each internal node has exactly four children. Used to partition a two-dimensional space by recursively subdividing it into four quadrants or regions. Allows to quickly find the nearest objects.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the QuadTree.
